author: Albert Stevens Crockett
description: Dilution is key to this fruity sweet 'n' sour cocktail, hence,  depending on your ice, the Charlie Chaplin may benefit from the addition of a splash of water prior to stirring.
name: Charlie Chaplin Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
